recipesJson.name: Black Rose milk
recipesJson.author: Chrisdvr1
recipesJson.description: After finally getting in some Rose milk and giving it a try couldn't help but throw this together. I think I'm pretty close to his base here what do you guys think?

reviews.text: This is great! That SC Blackberry is so good, and you used it perfectly in this mix. I'll be making tons of this. Thanks Chrisdvr!

Very nice, fruity smooth, satisfying . I took the liberty to substituted Cream Fresh ( FA ) and Vanilla Bean Ice Cream ( CAP )  and the Blackberry I used was ( FW ),  at the percentages listed,  due to the limitations of my stash .  This is the first time I have fallen in love with the Blackberry flavor .
